name: image-js
description: Image processing and manipulation in JavaScript
author: MichaÃ«l Zasso

scripts.build: npm run clean-dist && browserify src/image.js -o dist/image.js --standalone IJ --exclude canvas --exclude canvas/lib/bindings --ignore fs --transform babelify
scripts.build-test: browserify test/browser/bootstrap.js -o test/browser/image.js --standalone IJ --exclude canvas --exclude canvas/lib/bindings --ignore fs --debug --transform [ babelify --sourceMap ]
scripts.compile: npm run clean-lib && babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run test-mocha && npm run eslint
scripts.watch-browser: watchify test/browser/bootstrap.js -o test/browser/image.js --standalone IJ --exclude canvas --exclude canvas/lib/bindings --ignore fs --debug --transform [ babelify --sourceMap ]
